title: HELP A BR!
body:
Some US rioter to teach a Brazilian to speak English? - To play of course!

-Made in the google translator

replies.body:
Shoot, I'm not very good at teaching English! :'(

While I cannot directly help you learn English, I know there are plenty of online resources that can make it easy. I've personally used [Duolingo](https://www.duolingo.com/) to learn some Spanish and it was pretty easy to follow along. I suggest checking out their site or app as a good starting point.

Let me know if you have any other questions. ^.^
